stork.feather.util

Class Pump<R extends Resource>

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.feather.PipeElement<R>
      • stork.feather.Tap<R>
        • stork.feather.util.Pump<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - The Resource type of the Tap this Pump adapts.

    public abstract class Pump<R extends Resource>
extends Tap<R>
    A Pump is an adapter over a passive Tap allows it to be used as an active Tap by using a Crawler to automatically transfer all subresources.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class stork.feather.Tap

        active

        root

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pump(Tap<R> tap)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pump

        public Pump(Tap<R> tap)
        Create a Pump which operates on tap. tap must be a passive Tap.
        Parameters:
        tap - the Tap this Pump is adapting.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if tap is active.
